version_description:
Bugfix:
Fixed a bug related to Audiobus App-switching and launching in iOS 9
Selected Buffer-Size will be restored.
Smaller bug-fixes and enhancements.

Addition:
Inverted color-scheme.



Please make sure to install the latest server from our homepage.

http://studiomux.net/

Bugfix:
Fixed a bug related to Audiobus App-switching and launching in iOS 9
Selected Buffer-Size will be restored.
Smaller bug-fixes and enhancements.

Addition:

Please make sure to install the latest server from our homepage.

http://studiomux.net/

Please make sure to install the latest server from our homepage.

http://studiomux.net/

Hi,

features:
- integration of IAA sync
- sync Apps on multiple iPads with Ableton Link
- syncing with internal or external clock
- manual accessible from inside the App

enhancements
- completely reworked VSTs, AudioUnits and Server for Mac and Windows
- cpu usage and performance enhancements
- many bugfixes, making the App, Server, VST and AudioUnits more reliable

please make sure to download and install the new server from our webpage:

http://www.studiomux.net

If you run iOS8 or iOS7 please do NOT update Studiomux yet, we will release a new update soon. This version could crash on iOS7 or iOS8!

fixed volume slider
fixed a bug related to deleting effects
fixed a bug related to send effects
fixed crackling on iOS9 and newer devices

fixed volume slider

fixed a possible crash on iOS7 & iOS8

Fixed a bug that could create ghost midi ports on Mac
Fixed a bug that could create ghost midi ports on Mac
Fixed a bug that could create ghost midi ports on Mac
Fixed a bug that could create ghost midi ports on Mac

new features:

- user can select if they want to reload apps
- multiple iOS devices connected to the same UDP Port (OSC, Lemur, touch OSC) (currently unidirectional only; iOS -> Desktop)
- new Server (->download from www.studiomux.net)
- new VSTs for Windows

bug fixes:
- fixed loudness level on iPhones
- fixed mute/monitor state saving
- sensual sax works now without crashing studiomux
- further fixes and enhancements
- audioports are visible in Audiobus3 now
